author: travelandtourworld.com
title: AI flight to HK forced to land in KolkataTravelandtourworld.com
text:
AI flight to HK forced to land in Kolkata
Kolkata: Indian flag carrier Air Indiaâ€™s troubles with its Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner fleet seems to continue.
In the latest instance, Air India flight AI314 from Delhi to Hong Kong had to perform an emergency landing at the Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose International Airport early on Tuesday after the pilots detected a technical snag mid-air.
According to media reports, passengers protested against the airline after they were de-
boarded at the airport.
Further details are awaited.
